<script type="text/javascript">
  document.addEventListener("turbo:load", function () {
    // Check if Mixpanel API token is available
    var mixpanelToken = "a524618d7794c70f8d028f5b045ca8ec";
    if (!mixpanelToken || mixpanelToken === "") {
      console.warn("[Mixpanel] MIXPANEL_API_TOKEN is not set. Mixpanel will not initialize.");
      return;
    }

    if (!window.mixpanel.__loaded) {
    // Base configuration for all sites
      var config = {
        debug: true,
        persistence: 'localStorage',
        ignore_dnt: true,
      };


      // Initialize Mixpanel (stub pattern handles async loading automatically)
      try {
        mixpanel.init(mixpanelToken, config);
      } catch (e) {
        console.error("[Mixpanel] Initialization error:", e);
      }
    }

    function trackPageviewOnce(retryCount) {
      retryCount = retryCount || 0;
      var maxRetries = 30; // Maximum 30 retries (3 seconds total at 100ms intervals)
      var currentUrl = window.location.href;

      // Only track if URL has changed or this is the first load
      if (window.mixpanelLastTrackedUrl !== currentUrl) {
        if (window.mixpanel && typeof window.mixpanel.track_pageview === 'function') {
          mixpanel.track_pageview();
          window.mixpanelLastTrackedUrl = currentUrl;
        } else if (retryCount < maxRetries) {
          // If Mixpanel isn't ready yet, retry after a short delay
          setTimeout(function() {
            trackPageviewOnce(retryCount + 1);
          }, 100);
        } else {
          // Max retries reached - Mixpanel may be blocked or failed to load
          console.warn("Mixpanel pageview tracking failed: Maximum retry attempts reached");
        }
      }
    }


    // Register default properties on every turbo:load to ensure fresh data
    // (user may log in/out)
    // Always register properties, including for guests (user_type: "guest")
    const defaultProps = {"user_type":"guest"};
    // Wait for mixpanel to be ready, then register defaults
    const registerDefaults = function(retryCount) {
      retryCount = retryCount || 0;
      const maxRetries = 50; // 5 seconds max wait time (50 * 100ms)

      if (typeof mixpanel !== "undefined" && mixpanel.register) {
        mixpanel.register(defaultProps);
        // Store for fallback use
        window.mixpanelDefaultProperties = defaultProps;
      } else if (retryCount < maxRetries) {
        // Retry after a short delay if mixpanel isn't ready yet
        setTimeout(function() { registerDefaults(retryCount + 1); }, 100);
      } else {
        // Fallback: Store in window even if mixpanel isn't ready (mergeWithDefaults will use it)
        window.mixpanelDefaultProperties = defaultProps;
        console.warn("[Mixpanel] Mixpanel not ready after max retries, stored defaults for fallback");
      }
    };
    registerDefaults();

    let userId = ""
    if (userId !== '') {
      const mxUserId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`mp_a524618d7794c70f8d028f5b045ca8ec_mixpanel`))?.$user_id || null;
      if (mxUserId == null ){
        mixpanel.alias(userId);
        mixpanel.identify(userId);
      }
      else if (mxUserId !== userId ){
        mixpanel.identify(userId);
      }
    }
    // Track pageview once per URL (works for both full page loads and Turbo navigations)
    // Only track if enabled via ENV variable

  })
</script>

<script>
  (function() {
    window.I18n = {
      locale: "en",
      currency: "USD",
      translations: {},
      t: function(key) {
        var parts = key.split(".");
        var result = this.translations;
        for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
          result = result[parts[i]];
          if (result == null) return key;
        }
        return result;
      }
    };
  })();
</script>

    <script>
  var isCookieScriptInitialized = false;


  function initializeCookieScript() {
    if (!isCookieScriptInitialized) {
        isCookieScriptInitialized = true;
        CookieScript.init();
    }
  }

  function checkAndDisplayCookieBanner() {
    setTimeout(function () {
        if (typeof CookieScript.instance !== "undefined" && CookieScript.instance !== null) {
            if (typeof CookieScript.instance.currentState === "function" && CookieScript.instance.currentState().action === void 0) {
                CookieScript.instance = null;
                initializeCookieScript();
            }
        } else {
            initializeCookieScript();
        }
    }, 500);
  }

  document.addEventListener("turbo:load", function () {
    if (typeof CookieScript === 'undefined') {
      return;
    }

    initializeCookieScript();
    checkAndDisplayCookieBanner();
  });
</script>

        1. GET https://candy.ai/users/sign_in

          • WSTG-v42-ATHN-06
          • CWE-525
          • POLICY_PENTEST =
          • SYSTEMIC
          Alert description

          The cache-control header has not been set properly or is missing, allowing the browser and proxies to cache content. For static assets like css, js, or image files this might be intended, however, the resources should be reviewed to ensure that no sensitive content will be cached.

<script type="text/javascript">
  document.addEventListener("turbo:load", function () {
    // Check if Mixpanel API token is available
    var mixpanelToken = "a524618d7794c70f8d028f5b045ca8ec";
    if (!mixpanelToken || mixpanelToken === "") {
      console.warn("[Mixpanel] MIXPANEL_API_TOKEN is not set. Mixpanel will not initialize.");
      return;
    }

    if (!window.mixpanel.__loaded) {
    // Base configuration for all sites
      var config = {
        debug: true,
        persistence: 'localStorage',
        ignore_dnt: true,
      };


      // Initialize Mixpanel (stub pattern handles async loading automatically)
      try {
        mixpanel.init(mixpanelToken, config);
      } catch (e) {
        console.error("[Mixpanel] Initialization error:", e);
      }
    }

    function trackPageviewOnce(retryCount) {
      retryCount = retryCount || 0;
      var maxRetries = 30; // Maximum 30 retries (3 seconds total at 100ms intervals)
      var currentUrl = window.location.href;

      // Only track if URL has changed or this is the first load
      if (window.mixpanelLastTrackedUrl !== currentUrl) {
        if (window.mixpanel && typeof window.mixpanel.track_pageview === 'function') {
          mixpanel.track_pageview();
          window.mixpanelLastTrackedUrl = currentUrl;
        } else if (retryCount < maxRetries) {
          // If Mixpanel isn't ready yet, retry after a short delay
          setTimeout(function() {
            trackPageviewOnce(retryCount + 1);
          }, 100);
        } else {
          // Max retries reached - Mixpanel may be blocked or failed to load
          console.warn("Mixpanel pageview tracking failed: Maximum retry attempts reached");
        }
      }
    }


    // Register default properties on every turbo:load to ensure fresh data
    // (user may log in/out)
    // Always register properties, including for guests (user_type: "guest")
    const defaultProps = {"user_type":"guest"};
    // Wait for mixpanel to be ready, then register defaults
    const registerDefaults = function(retryCount) {
      retryCount = retryCount || 0;
      const maxRetries = 50; // 5 seconds max wait time (50 * 100ms)

      if (typeof mixpanel !== "undefined" && mixpanel.register) {
        mixpanel.register(defaultProps);
        // Store for fallback use
        window.mixpanelDefaultProperties = defaultProps;
      } else if (retryCount < maxRetries) {
        // Retry after a short delay if mixpanel isn't ready yet
        setTimeout(function() { registerDefaults(retryCount + 1); }, 100);
      } else {
        // Fallback: Store in window even if mixpanel isn't ready (mergeWithDefaults will use it)
        window.mixpanelDefaultProperties = defaultProps;
        console.warn("[Mixpanel] Mixpanel not ready after max retries, stored defaults for fallback");
      }
    };
    registerDefaults();

    let userId = ""
    if (userId !== '') {
      const mxUserId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`mp_a524618d7794c70f8d028f5b045ca8ec_mixpanel`))?.$user_id || null;
      if (mxUserId == null ){
        mixpanel.alias(userId);
        mixpanel.identify(userId);
      }
      else if (mxUserId !== userId ){
        mixpanel.identify(userId);
      }
    }
    // Track pageview once per URL (works for both full page loads and Turbo navigations)
    // Only track if enabled via ENV variable

  })
</script>




      <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
    <script>
      (function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
      new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
      j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
      "https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id="+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
      })(window,document,'script','dataLayer',"GTM-NM6MQN67");
    </script>
    <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->


<script>
  (function() {
    window.I18n = {
      locale: "en",
      currency: "USD",
      translations: {},
      t: function(key) {
        var parts = key.split(".");
        var result = this.translations;
        for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
          result = result[parts[i]];
          if (result == null) return key;
        }
        return result;
      }
    };
  })();
</script>

    <script>
  var isCookieScriptInitialized = false;


  function initializeCookieScript() {
    if (!isCookieScriptInitialized) {
        isCookieScriptInitialized = true;
        CookieScript.init();
    }
  }

  function checkAndDisplayCookieBanner() {
    setTimeout(function () {
        if (typeof CookieScript.instance !== "undefined" && CookieScript.instance !== null) {
            if (typeof CookieScript.instance.currentState === "function" && CookieScript.instance.currentState().action === void 0) {
                CookieScript.instance = null;
                initializeCookieScript();
            }
        } else {
            initializeCookieScript();
        }
    }, 500);
  }

  document.addEventListener("turbo:load", function () {
    if (typeof CookieScript === 'undefined') {
      return;
    }

    initializeCookieScript();
    checkAndDisplayCookieBanner();
  });
</script>

    
    
  <script defer src="https://static.cloudflareinsights.com/beacon.min.js/vcd15cbe7772f49c399c6a5babf22c1241717689176015" integrity="sha512-ZpsOmlRQV6y907TI0dKBHq9Md29nnaEIPlkf84rnaERnq6zvWvPUqr2ft8M1aS28oN72PdrCzSjY4U6VaAw1EQ==" data-cf-beacon='{"rayId":"9ab6427e7a9c815b","version":"2025.9.1","serverTiming":{"name":{"cfExtPri":true,"cfEdge":true,"cfOrigin":true,"cfL4":true,"cfSpeedBrain":true,"cfCacheStatus":true}},"token":"a4d5023a012f41e0b0324067f7ed0b96","b":1}' crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
</body>
</html>
          Parameter 
          cache-control
          Evidence 
          no-cache
          Solution

          For secure content, ensure the cache-control HTTP header is set with "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate". If an asset should be cached consider setting the directives "public, max-age, immutable".
      4. User Controllable HTML Element Attribute (Potential XSS) (1)
        1. GET https://candy.ai/feed/posts?locale=fr
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2017_A01
          • OWASP_2021_A03
          • CWE-20
          • POLICY_PENTEST =
          Alert description

          This check looks at user-supplied input in query string parameters and POST data to identify where certain HTML attribute values might be controlled. This provides hot-spot detection for XSS (cross-site scripting) that will require further review by a security analyst to determine exploitability.
          Other info

          User-controlled HTML attribute values were found. Try injecting special characters to see if XSS might be possible. The page at the following URL:

          https://candy.ai/feed/posts?locale=fr

          appears to include user input in:

          a(n) [meta] tag [content] attribute

          The user input found was:

          locale=fr

          The user-controlled value was:

          https://candy.ai/feed/posts?locale=fr

            a.push([d].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 0)))
          }
        }

        var a = b;
        "undefined" !== typeof c ? a = b[c] = [] : c = "mixpanel";
        a.people = a.people || [];

          "mixpanel" !== c && (d += "." + c);

          return a.toString(1) + ".people (stub)"

              a.push([e, call2])

      };

<script type="text/javascript">
  document.addEventListener("turbo:load", function () {
    // Check if Mixpanel API token is available
    var mixpanelToken = "a524618d7794c70f8d028f5b045ca8ec";
    if (!mixpanelToken || mixpanelToken === "") {
      console.warn("[Mixpanel] MIXPANEL_API_TOKEN is not set. Mixpanel will not initialize.");
      return;
    }

    if (!window.mixpanel.__loaded) {
    // Base configuration for all sites
      var config = {
        debug: true,
        persistence: 'localStorage',
        ignore_dnt: true,
      };


      // Initialize Mixpanel (stub pattern handles async loading automatically)
      try {
        mixpanel.init(mixpanelToken, config);
      } catch (e) {
        console.error("[Mixpanel] Initialization error:", e);
      }
    }

    function trackPageviewOnce(retryCount) {
      retryCount = retryCount || 0;
      var maxRetries = 30; // Maximum 30 retries (3 seconds total at 100ms intervals)
      var currentUrl = window.location.href;

      // Only track if URL has changed or this is the first load
      if (window.mixpanelLastTrackedUrl !== currentUrl) {
        if (window.mixpanel && typeof window.mixpanel.track_pageview === 'function') {
          mixpanel.track_pageview();
          window.mixpanelLastTrackedUrl = currentUrl;
        } else if (retryCount < maxRetries) {
          // If Mixpanel isn't ready yet, retry after a short delay
          setTimeout(function() {
            trackPageviewOnce(retryCount + 1);
          }, 100);
        } else {
          // Max retries reached - Mixpanel may be blocked or failed to load
          console.warn("Mixpanel pageview tracking failed: Maximum retry attempts reached");
        }
      }
    }


    // Register default properties on every turbo:load to ensure fresh data
    // (user may log in/out)
    // Always register properties, including for guests (user_type: "guest")
    const defaultProps = {"user_type":"guest"};
    // Wait for mixpanel to be ready, then register defaults
    const registerDefaults = function(retryCount) {
      retryCount = retryCount || 0;
      const maxRetries = 50; // 5 seconds max wait time (50 * 100ms)

      if (typeof mixpanel !== "undefined" && mixpanel.register) {
        mixpanel.register(defaultProps);
        // Store for fallback use
        window.mixpanelDefaultProperties = defaultProps;
      } else if (retryCount < maxRetries) {
        // Retry after a short delay if mixpanel isn't ready yet
        setTimeout(function() { registerDefaults(retryCount + 1); }, 100);
      } else {
        // Fallback: Store in window even if mixpanel isn't ready (mergeWithDefaults will use it)
        window.mixpanelDefaultProperties = defaultProps;
        console.warn("[Mixpanel] Mixpanel not ready after max retries, stored defaults for fallback");
      }
    };
    registerDefaults();

    let userId = ""
    if (userId !== '') {
      const mxUserId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`mp_a524618d7794c70f8d028f5b045ca8ec_mixpanel`))?.$user_id || null;
      if (mxUserId == null ){
        mixpanel.alias(userId);
        mixpanel.identify(userId);
      }
      else if (mxUserId !== userId ){
        mixpanel.identify(userId);
      }
    }
    // Track pageview once per URL (works for both full page loads and Turbo navigations)
    // Only track if enabled via ENV variable

  })
</script>

      j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
      "https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id="+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
      })(window,document,'script','dataLayer',"GTM-NM6MQN67");
    </script>
    <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->


<script>
  (function() {
    window.I18n = {
      locale: "de",
      currency: "USD",
      translations: {},
      t: function(key) {
        var parts = key.split(".");
        var result = this.translations;
        for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
          result = result[parts[i]];
          if (result == null) return key;
        }
        return result;
      }
    };
  })();
</script>

          role="tooltip"
          class="z-[9999] hidden invisible px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-white transition-opacity duration-300 bg-grey-tooltip rounded-lg shadow-2xs opacity-0 tooltip tooltip-sidebar dark:bg-gray-700 fixed whitespace-nowrap pointer-events-none"
        >

        <div class="justify-start items-center gap-1 inline-flex">
          <a class="text-neutral-300 text-[8px] font-medium leading-[14px] " href="/fr/privacy-policy">Datenschutz</a>
          <div class="w-1 h-1 bg-zinc-300 rounded-full"></div>

          <a class="text-neutral-300 text-[8px] font-medium leading-[14px] " href="/fr/legal-information">AGB</a>
          <div class="w-1 h-1 bg-zinc-300 rounded-full"></div>

          <a target="_blank" class="text-neutral-300 text-[8px] font-medium leading-[14px] " href="https://everai.zendesk.com/hc/en-us">Hilfezentrum</a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </nav>
</div>

      <turbo-frame id="recaptchas">
        <script src="https://www.recaptcha.net/recaptcha/api.js?render=6Ldewy4qAAAAAKX9LwxbMG3q1m29B1pDv4oXZ3qp"   ></script>
        <script>
          // Define function so that we can call it again later if we need to reset it
          // This executes reCAPTCHA and then calls our callback.
          function executeRecaptchaForSignup() {
            grecaptcha.ready(function() {
              grecaptcha.execute('6Ldewy4qAAAAAKX9LwxbMG3q1m29B1pDv4oXZ3qp', {action: 'signup'}).then(function(token) {
                setInputWithRecaptchaResponseTokenForSignup('g-recaptcha-response-data-signup', token)
              });
            });
          };
          // Invoke immediately
          executeRecaptchaForSignup()

          // Async variant so you can await this function from another async function (no need for
          // an explicit callback function then!)
          // Returns a Promise that resolves with the response token.
          async function executeRecaptchaForSignupAsync() {
            return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
             grecaptcha.ready(async function() {
                resolve(await grecaptcha.execute('6Ldewy4qAAAAAKX9LwxbMG3q1m29B1pDv4oXZ3qp', {action: 'signup'}))
              });
            })
          };

                  var setInputWithRecaptchaResponseTokenForSignup = function(id, token) {
          var element = document.getElementById(id);
          if (element !== null) element.value = token;
        }

        </script>
<input type="hidden" name="g-recaptcha-response-data[signup]" id="g-recaptcha-response-data-signup" data-sitekey="6Ldewy4qAAAAAKX9LwxbMG3q1m29B1pDv4oXZ3qp" class="g-recaptcha g-recaptcha-response "/>

</turbo-frame>    <div id="signup-btn">

    </div>
</form>  <div class="flex flex-row items-center pt-6 pb-5">
    <div
      class="flex-1 h-[1px]"
      style="background: linear-gradient(270deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.30) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.00) 100%);"
    ></div>
    <div class="text-white text-sm font-medium mx-4">
      oder fortfahren mit
    </div>
    <div
      class="flex-1 h-[1px]"
      style="background: linear-gradient(270deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.00) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.30) 100%);"
    ></div>

<div class="text-[10px] font-medium text-grey-default text-center mt-5 lg:mt-5 mb-4 lg:mb-5">
  Mit der Registrierung stimmst du den <a href="/fr/legal-information" class="underline">Nutzungsbedingungen</a> zu
</div>

  <script>
      try {
        (async function collect24metricsData() {
          if (typeof ASP !== 'undefined' && ASP.get24metricsData) {
            let jsData = await ASP.get24metricsData()
            let hiddenField = document.getElementById('js_check_data_registration');
            if (hiddenField && hiddenField.value === '') {
              hiddenField.value = jsData;
            }
          } else {
            setTimeout(collect24metricsData, 100);
          }
        })();
      } catch (error) {
        console.warn('24metrics initialization failed:', error);
      }
  </script>
</div>

      </div>
      <div class="flex-0 px-8" style="width: 100%; height: 0px; opacity: 0.20; border: 0.50px white solid"></div>
      <div class="flex flex-0 mt-5 font-medium text-sm justify-center items-center text-white px-3 mb-5">
        Hast du bereits ein Konto? Â 
        <div
          data-action="click->main#closeRegistrationModal click->main#openSignInModal"
          class="text-primary text-sm font-semibold leading-normal cursor-pointer">
          Anmelden
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</turbo-frame>        <turbo-frame id="sign-in-modal">

      <style>
  /* Desktop feed container - scroll-based navigation */
  .feed-desktop-container {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
    scroll-snap-type: y mandatory;
    overflow-y: scroll;
    height: 100vh;
    padding-top: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 20px;
  }

  /* Hide scrollbar but keep functionality */
  .feed-desktop-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }
  .feed-desktop-container {
    -ms-overflow-style: none;
    scrollbar-width: none;
  }

  /* Desktop video card with snap behavior */
  .feed-desktop-video {
    scroll-snap-align: start;
    scroll-snap-stop: always;
    border-radius: 20px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
  }

  /* Portrait orientation (height > width): 4:5 aspect ratio (1078x1348) */
  @media (orientation: portrait) {
    .feed-desktop-video {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
      height: calc(100vh - 45px); /* Takes almost full viewport for single-slide view */
      min-height: 600px;
    }
  }

  /* Landscape orientation (width > height): 4:5 aspect ratio with viewport constraints */
  @media (orientation: landscape) {
    .feed-desktop-video {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), 520px, calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
      height: calc(100vh - 45px); /* Takes almost full viewport for single-slide view */
      min-height: 600px; /* Ensure reasonable size on short screens */
    }
  }

  /* Very large screens (width > 2K): maintain 4:5 aspect ratio with larger max */
  @media (min-width: 2000px) {
    .feed-desktop-video {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), 1078px, calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
      height: calc(100vh - 45px);
      min-height: 600px;
    }
  }

  /* Gap between videos - minimal spacing */
  .feed-desktop-video:not(:last-child) {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }

  /* Video and image styling - scope strictly to media elements */
  .feed-desktop-video .feed-desktop-media {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  /* Gradient overlay for video info */
  .feed-desktop-overlay {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 279px;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4));
    padding: 84px 18px 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: flex-end;
  }

  /* Loading skeleton for desktop */
  .feed-desktop-skeleton {
    border-radius: 20px;
    margin: 0 auto 10px; /* match video bottom margin */
    padding-top: 75px; /* align with media top offset while preserving total height */
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  /* Portrait orientation skeleton - match video dimensions with 4:5 aspect ratio */
  @media (orientation: portrait) {
    .feed-desktop-skeleton {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
      height: calc(100vh - 120px);
      min-height: 525px;
    }
  }

  /* Landscape orientation skeleton - match video dimensions with 4:5 aspect ratio */
  @media (orientation: landscape) {
    .feed-desktop-skeleton {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), 520px, calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
      height: calc(100vh - 120px);
      min-height: 525px;
    }
  }

  /* Very large screens skeleton - match video dimensions with 4:5 aspect ratio */
  @media (min-width: 2000px) {
    .feed-desktop-skeleton {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), 1078px, calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
      height: calc(100vh - 120px);
      min-height: 525px;
    }
  }

  /* Desktop row layout: content + sidebar */
  .feed-desktop-row {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 24px;
  }

  .feed-desktop-content-column {
    /* Width set via media queries to match video dimensions */
  }

  /* Portrait orientation content column - match video width with 4:5 aspect ratio */
  @media (orientation: portrait) {
    .feed-desktop-content-column {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
    }
  }

  /* Landscape orientation content column - match video width with 4:5 aspect ratio */
  @media (orientation: landscape) {
    .feed-desktop-content-column {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), 520px, calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
    }
  }

  /* Very large screens content column - match video width with 4:5 aspect ratio */
  @media (min-width: 2000px) {
    .feed-desktop-content-column {
      width: min(calc((100vh - 45px) * 0.8), 1078px, calc(100vw - 220px - 72px - 48px));
    }
  }

  /* Remove auto-centering margins when inside the content column */
  .feed-desktop-content-column .feed-desktop-video {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
  }

  /* Ensure skeleton aligns exactly like videos inside content column */
  .feed-desktop-content-column .feed-desktop-skeleton {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
  }

  /* Right-hand sidebar with like counter (sticks within scroll container) */
  .feed-desktop-actions-sidebar {
    width: 72px;
    position: sticky;
    top: 20px; /* align with container padding */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: flex-end; /* push like button to the bottom */
    padding-bottom: 56px; /* lift button a bit more to align with visible content */
    overflow: visible; /* prevent Safari from clipping text/shadows */
  }

  /* Ensure button and text don't get clipped */
  .feed-desktop-actions-sidebar button {
    overflow: visible;
  }

  /* Portrait orientation actions sidebar */
  @media (orientation: portrait) {
    .feed-desktop-actions-sidebar {
      height: calc(100vh - 45px);
      min-height: 600px;
    }
  }

  /* Landscape orientation actions sidebar */
  @media (orientation: landscape) {
    .feed-desktop-actions-sidebar {
      height: calc(100vh - 45px);
      min-height: 600px;
    }
  }

  /* Spacer to reserve sidebar width during loading skeleton */
  .feed-desktop-actions-spacer {
    width: 72px;
  }

  /* Fade bottom gradient to indicate more content */
  .feed-desktop-container::after {
    content: '';
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 73px;
    background: linear-gradient(to top, #131313, transparent);
    pointer-events: none;
    z-index: 10;
  }

  /* Like button splash animation */
  .feed-like-splash {
    animation: likeSplash 400ms cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1);
  }

  @keyframes likeSplash {
    0% {
      transform: scale(1);
    }
    50% {
      transform: scale(1.3);
    }
    100% {
      transform: scale(1);
    }
  }

  /* Compact play overlay (YouTube/Instagram style) */
  .feed-play-overlay {
    position: absolute;
    inset: 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    pointer-events: none;
    z-index: 5;
  }
  .feed-play-button {
    width: 64px; /* 64px circle */
    height: 64px;
    border-radius: 9999px;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.45);
    backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);
    transform: scale(0.92);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 150ms ease-out, transform 150ms ease-out;
  }
  .feed-play-overlay-visible .feed-play-button {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }

  /* Ensure media itself has rounded corners (not only the container) */
  .feed-desktop-media {
    border-radius: 20px;
  }

  /* Apply top offset only to the currently visible slide */
  .feed-desktop-video.is-visible .feed-desktop-media {
    margin-top: 75px;
  }
</style>

    </div>

    <script>
  var isCookieScriptInitialized = false;


  function initializeCookieScript() {
    if (!isCookieScriptInitialized) {
        isCookieScriptInitialized = true;
        CookieScript.init();
    }
  }

  function checkAndDisplayCookieBanner() {
    setTimeout(function () {
        if (typeof CookieScript.instance !== "undefined" && CookieScript.instance !== null) {
            if (typeof CookieScript.instance.currentState === "function" && CookieScript.instance.currentState().action === void 0) {
                CookieScript.instance = null;
                initializeCookieScript();
            }
        } else {
            initializeCookieScript();
        }
    }, 500);
  }

  document.addEventListener("turbo:load", function () {
    if (typeof CookieScript === 'undefined') {
      return;
    }

    initializeCookieScript();
    checkAndDisplayCookieBanner();
  });
</script>

    
    
  </body>
</html>
          Parameter 
          locale
          Solution

          Validate all input and sanitize output it before writing to any HTML attributes.

Appendix

Alert Types

This section contains additional information on the types of alerts in the report.

  1. Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens)
    CWE ID 352
    WASC ID 9
    Reference
    1. https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Cross-Site_Request_Forgery_Prevention_Cheat_Sheet.html
    2. https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/352.html

  2. CSP: Failure to Define Directive with No Fallback

    Source raised by a passive scanner (CSP)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    2. https://caniuse.com/#search=content+security+policy
    3. https://content-security-policy.com/
    4. https://github.com/HtmlUnit/htmlunit-csp
    5. https://web.dev/articles/csp#resource-options

    Source raised by a passive scanner (CSP)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    2. https://caniuse.com/#search=content+security+policy
